Container.Name: Emby
Container.Overview: Emby (former Media Browser Server) is a home media server built on top of other popular open source technologies such as Service Stack, jQuery, jQuery mobile, and Mono.It features a REST-based api with built-in documention to facilitate client development. We also have client libraries for our api to enable rapid development.
Container.Description: Emby (former Media Browser Server) is a home media server built on top of other popular open source technologies such as Service Stack, jQuery, jQuery mobile, and Mono.It features a REST-based api with built-in documention to facilitate client development. We also have client libraries for our api to enable rapid development.[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is used to store the configuration and the database files of Media Browser.[br] [b]/movies[/b] : set this path to where you store your movie files.[br] [b]/tv[/b] : set this path to where you store your tv shows files.
